column5: If you're looking for a comfortable place in Brentwood with character then you've found it. It's a great launching pad for your Austin adventure located right in the Burnet district a stones throw to quick public transit downtown. Walk to several bars including Lala's (famous Christmas bar), Yard Bar, Pour House, or Aristocrat and several top notch restaurants: Stubb's BBQ, Bufalina Due, Barley Swine, Flyrite, or Lick!
column8: Retro & Convenient to Downtown in Burnet District
